attributes.action: Acknowledge the 250th anniversay of the Birth of Horatio Nelson.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To ensure that the Country's finest naval commander is recognised on the 250th anniversary of his birth. Be this via a Parade, or via an acknowledgement from the Prime Minister is up for discussion. The petition concerns purely something happen to commemorate.
Born on 29 September 1758, Horatio Nelson commanded British Fleets in many battles, none more famous than the Battle of Trafalgar. The Battle killed Nelson, but victory ensure safe British waters for years to come.
A true British Hero.
